version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Fixed sorting when some channels are missing. - Fixed coloring based on the amount of channels.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added GUI and many other new features to the script.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added button for setting all Channels with the same source.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added Option for skipping sampless channels. - Added Drag and Drop for swapping samples. - Added Drag and Drop files to assign samples

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Added a feature for Channel 10 (drums channel): feature redistributes notes to their own tracks and renames tracks to their corresponding drum names that those pitches are mapped to by the MIDI standard.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Fixed crashing when Channels are filtered out in the MIDI Editor. - Fixed sometimes wacky folder generation. - Fixed poor sorting for drums. - Added Roland GS drums into the drums list. - Added notes counter in the progress bars. - Tweaked style a bit. - Added hint about not entirely loaded MIDI.

version.author: Zly
version.changelog: - Improved algorithm so it's much more faster. - Added option for Disabling Interactive Generation (improves performance) - Implemented Deps checker.
